trans-unit.source: Deploy a line of business application | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Deploy a line of business application | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Deploy a web-based, highly-available, line of business application with SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Groups in Azure in five phases.
trans-unit.target: Deploy a web-based, highly-available, line of business application with SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Groups in Azure in five phases.

trans-unit.source: Deploy a high-availability line of business application in Azure
trans-unit.target: Deploy a high-availability line of business application in Azure

trans-unit.source: This article contains links to the step-by-step instructions for deploying a high-availability, intranet-only, web-based line of business application with SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Groups in Azure infrastructure services.
trans-unit.target: This article contains links to the step-by-step instructions for deploying a high-availability, intranet-only, web-based line of business application with SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Groups in Azure infrastructure services.

trans-unit.source: The application is hosted on these computers:
trans-unit.target: The application is hosted on these computers:

trans-unit.source: Two web servers
trans-unit.target: Two web servers

trans-unit.source: Two database servers
trans-unit.target: Two database servers

trans-unit.source: One cluster majority node server
trans-unit.target: One cluster majority node server

trans-unit.source: Two domain controllers
trans-unit.target: Two domain controllers

trans-unit.source: This is the configuration, with placeholder names for each server.
trans-unit.target: This is the configuration, with placeholder names for each server.

trans-unit.source: At least two machines for each role ensure high availability.
trans-unit.target: At least two machines for each role ensure high availability.

trans-unit.source: All of the virtual machines are in a single Azure location (also known as a region).
trans-unit.target: All of the virtual machines are in a single Azure location (also known as a region).

trans-unit.source: Each group of virtual machines for a specific role is in their own availability set.
trans-unit.target: Each group of virtual machines for a specific role is in their own availability set.

trans-unit.source: You deploy this configuration in the following phases:
trans-unit.target: You deploy this configuration in the following phases:

trans-unit.source: [Phase 1: Configure Azure](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase1.md).
trans-unit.target: [Phase 1: Configure Azure](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase1.md).

trans-unit.source: Create storage accounts, availability sets, and a cross-premises virtual network.
trans-unit.target: Create storage accounts, availability sets, and a cross-premises virtual network.

trans-unit.source: [Phase 2: Configure domain controllers](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase2.md).
trans-unit.target: [Phase 2: Configure domain controllers](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase2.md).

trans-unit.source: Create and configure replica Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS) domain controllers.
trans-unit.target: Create and configure replica Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS) domain controllers.

trans-unit.source: [Phase 3: Configure SQL Server infrastructure](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase3.md).
trans-unit.target: [Phase 3: Configure SQL Server infrastructure](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase3.md).

trans-unit.source: Create and configure the virtual machines running SQL Server, create the cluster, and enable SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Groups.
trans-unit.target: Create and configure the virtual machines running SQL Server, create the cluster, and enable SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Groups.

trans-unit.source: [Phase 4: Configure web servers](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase4.md).
trans-unit.target: [Phase 4: Configure web servers](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase4.md).

trans-unit.source: Create and configure the two web server virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: Create and configure the two web server virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: [Phase 5: Add the application databases to a SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Group](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase5.md).
trans-unit.target: [Phase 5: Add the application databases to a SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Group](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase5.md).

trans-unit.source: Prepare the line of business application databases and add them to a SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Group.
trans-unit.target: Prepare the line of business application databases and add them to a SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Group.

trans-unit.source: This deployment is designed to accompany the [Line of Business Applications architecture blueprint](http://msdn.microsoft.com/dn630664) and incorporate the latest recommendations.
trans-unit.target: This deployment is designed to accompany the [Line of Business Applications architecture blueprint](http://msdn.microsoft.com/dn630664) and incorporate the latest recommendations.

trans-unit.source: This is a prescriptive, pre-defined architecture.
trans-unit.target: This is a prescriptive, pre-defined architecture.

trans-unit.source: Keep the following in mind:
trans-unit.target: Keep the following in mind:

trans-unit.source: If you are an experienced web-based, line of business application implementer, please feel free to adapt the instructions in Phases 3 through 5 and build the application infrastructure that best suits your needs.
trans-unit.target: If you are an experienced web-based, line of business application implementer, please feel free to adapt the instructions in Phases 3 through 5 and build the application infrastructure that best suits your needs.

trans-unit.source: If you already have an existing Azure hybrid cloud implementation, please feel free to adapt or skip the instructions in Phases 1 and 2 to host the virtual machines for the new application on the appropriate subnet.
trans-unit.target: If you already have an existing Azure hybrid cloud implementation, please feel free to adapt or skip the instructions in Phases 1 and 2 to host the virtual machines for the new application on the appropriate subnet.

trans-unit.source: All of the servers are located on a single subnet in the Azure virtual network.
trans-unit.target: All of the servers are located on a single subnet in the Azure virtual network.

trans-unit.source: If you want to provide additional security equivalent to subnet isolation, you can use [Network Security Groups](../virtual-networks/virtual-networks-nsg.md).
trans-unit.target: If you want to provide additional security equivalent to subnet isolation, you can use [Network Security Groups](../virtual-networks/virtual-networks-nsg.md).

trans-unit.source: To build a dev/test environment or a proof-of-concept of this configuration, see [Set up a web-based LOB application in a hybrid cloud for testing](../virtual-network/virtual-networks-setup-lobapp-hybrid-cloud-testing.md).
trans-unit.target: To build a dev/test environment or a proof-of-concept of this configuration, see [Set up a web-based LOB application in a hybrid cloud for testing](../virtual-network/virtual-networks-setup-lobapp-hybrid-cloud-testing.md).

trans-unit.source: For additional information about designing IT workloads for Azure, see [Azure infrastructure services implementation guidelines](virtual-machines-infrastructure-services-implementation-guidelines.md).
trans-unit.target: For additional information about designing IT workloads for Azure, see [Azure infrastructure services implementation guidelines](virtual-machines-infrastructure-services-implementation-guidelines.md).

trans-unit.source: Next step
trans-unit.target: Next step

trans-unit.source: To start the configuration of this workload, go to [Phase 1: Configure Azure](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase1.md).
trans-unit.target: To start the configuration of this workload, go to [Phase 1: Configure Azure](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase1.md).

trans-unit.target: Additional resources

trans-unit.target: Line of Business Applications architecture blueprint

trans-unit.target: Set up a web-based LOB application in a hybrid cloud for testing

trans-unit.target: Azure infrastructure services implementation guidelines

trans-unit.source: Azure Infrastructure Services Workload: SharePoint Server 2013 farm
trans-unit.target: Azure Infrastructure Services Workload: SharePoint Server 2013 farm
